column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The reason for this is that on many occasions
column2: we have seated incomplete parties that would eventually hold a table for more than an hour before ordering food
column3: even after telling the host the other persons were just parking the car and would arrive shortly. As a result
column4: we received numerous complaints from other parties that had arrived but could not be seated
column5: even thought there appeared to be many open seats available.
